about_the_game:
A casual adventure in a high school setting

Embark on a new journey to high school where you learn how to
build friendships, welcome others, and have good times with the people you care about.

Stunning visuals and a wonderful art style

The cities, the landscapes, the characters... all of it looks so wonderful
once you see it
on your screen.

Uplifting music and songs for you to enjoy

The graceful music and uplifting songs will bring you a
relaxing ambience as you play the game. Sing along with the songs and replay the videos as much as you like!

100 Gallery Pictures To Collect

Collect biographies, pictures, and scenes with all of your favorite characters!
Learn more about the characters and enjoy the memories you shared in the story!

Save often so you can return to your favorite chapters

There are over 100 Save Slots for you to use. It's a good idea to save at the beginning
of each chapter and song. That way, you can always come back to your favorite scenes and songs!

Steam Achievements for you to collect

Play through the game and get Steam Achievements!
There's 13 to collect in all!

Additional Notes


This game is family friendly and has no adult content.

The game is meant to be played as if you were watching an anime or
reading a manga.

As the writers of the story, we wish to bring these heart-warming memories to you
so that you can enjoy them as well.

This game will give you the most impact if you read it from start to finish.

Thank you!
